summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.47.004, 23.47.006 and 23.47.010 of the Seattle Municipal Code; to limit the hours commercial uses in Neighborhood Commercial 1 (NC1) zones may be open to the public; to allow additional hours open to the public in NC1 zones by conditional use approval; and to correct inadvertent errors in the maximum size of use chart.
